Sacred texts in tidy formats

sacred.Rd

Sacred texts in tidy formats

Datasets

  • king_james_version tibble of the King James bible, one row per verse.

  • apocrypha tibble of books in the Apocrypha, one row per verse.

  • vulgate tibble of books in the Vulgate, one row per verse.

  • tanach tibble of books in the Tanach, one row per verse.

  • septuagint tibble of books in the Septuagint, one row per verse.

  • greek_new_testament tibble of books in the Greek New Testatement, one row per verse.

  • middle_english_stopwords tibble of Middle English stopwords.

  • middle_english_sentiments tibble lexicon of Middle English positive and negative terms.

  • Datasets
